abstract: Sites like Facebook, Twitter and LinkedIn are starting to upend entrepreneurs’ long-established methods of networking.
snippet: Sites like Facebook, Twitter and LinkedIn are starting to upend entrepreneurs’ long-established methods of networking.
lead_paragraph: By choice or necessity, successful small-business owners are earnest networkers, gladly shaking hands, handing out cards and attending local meetings to find and keep customers, solve problems, seek feedback or support and bolster their bottom lines.

headline.main: Small Business Takes Small Steps in Online Networking
